short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension helps to convert pixels into viewport units from figma layouts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flexunits is an extension for converting size of elements in pixels into viewport units: vw and vh.
It has three states: desktop, tablet and mobile, which can be easily configured by setting width and height.
The extension only works with figma layouts.
Flexunits can save developers' time for calculations.
